html:
Hitchhiking a lot
On the galactic highway
Meeting God himself
Driving a Cadillac
And after lunch
Having another coffee
Another impulse
When sadness is all around
There is a house
Of near to be dead
Next to this building
I see it daily
I see it daily
And I donâ€™t feel no sadness
I just see a house
Of near to be dead
title: Hitchhiking
